translation.Message_0_Page_0: The penguins shouldn't be that much of a problem.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: However if you run into more beefy enemies, i recommend using explosives against them.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: If you don't have any explosives on you right now, don't worry, I'm sure you'll find something within the base.
translation.Message_0_Page_3: The penguins have apparently been developing some very bouncy snowballs.
